mapper.sql: ID, TicketID, Action, PreValidPeriod, PreMobile, Deleted, CreateTime, UpdateTime
mapper.select:
select
from LGC_TicketHistory where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and Deleted = 0

from LGC_TicketHistory where TicketID = #{ticketid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and Deleted = 0

select
from LGC_TicketHistory where PreMobile = #{premobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and Deleted = 0

TicketID = #{ticketid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update LGC_TicketHistory set TicketID = #{ticketid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Action = #{action,jdbcType=BIT}, PreValidPeriod = #{prevalidperiod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PreMobile = #{premobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UpdateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(1) from LGC_TicketHistory where Deleted = 0 and (Action = 2 or Action = 6) and TicketID = #{ticketid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and Deleted = 0

select
from LGC_TicketHistory where (Action = 2 or Action = 6) and TicketID = #{ticketid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and Deleted = 0
